map.lobby.wannabethere: Want to be on this leaderboard? Post a YouTube video of your map speedrun! I’ll definitely watch it, and the best speedruns will appear here!
map.lobby.timer: Click here to toggle the speedrun timer. It will be displayed above your inventory after the game starts.
map.lobby.ifyouwanttosupport: If you want to support me financially, click here to get the link
map.lobby.beforestarting: Before starting the game, select your desired language in the Minecraft settings (Русский (Россия), Español (España), English (US)), and then click here for that language.
map.lobby.corneroptifinesodiumiloveyou: A message should have appeared in the top left corner of your screen. If it didn’t, disable shaders. For full immersion, remove OptiFine and Sodium. Also, optimization mods may affect the map. Overall, playing with mods is not recommended. Set your render distance to at least 9 chunks (Set Simulation Distance to 10+ chunks)
map.lobby.brightness: Adjust your brightness so that you can barely make out what is inside the box (Usually 20-30%)
map.lobby.copyright: Copyright: The map includes music that may affect your video/stream. Skip it if you’re not a streamer or YouTuber. To disable licensed music, click the picture or enter the command /trigger copyright
map.lobby.fabulous: Fabulous Graphics is highly recommended for the map. You can see the difference below.
map.lobby.footstep: The map features particles from walking on snow. This setting doesn’t affect anything; I’m just showing off ☺
map.lobby.telegram: Click to get the Telegram channel link
map.lobby.telegram_text: Subscribe to be the first to know about news and new chapters
map.lobby.hard_reset: Right-click to perform a full map reset
map.lobby.hard_reset_desc: Your achievement stats, completion time, and more will be deleted
map.text.bobicraft_line3: . To enable it again, type the command again (/trigger bobicraft), or click on this message
map.text.markiplier_line3: . To enable it again, type the command again (/trigger markiplier), or click on this message
map.text.licence_music_line3_1: . To enable it again, type the command again (/trigger copyright), or click on this message
map.text.licence_music_line3_2: . To disable it again, type the command again (/trigger copyright), or click on this message
map.advancement.title: Detective Stories
map.advancement.way_to_go.title: Way to go...
map.advancement.way_to_go.description: Make your actions ensure that the sign never lights up again
map.advancement.music_lover.title: Music Lover
map.advancement.music_lover.description: Listen to every single song on the radio
map.advancement.lucky.title: Lucky
map.advancement.lucky.description: Win twice in a row at the one-armed bandit
map.advancement.brepsi.title: Ohh, Brepsi
map.advancement.brepsi.description: Find all 5 Brepsi bottles scattered around the map
map.advancement.mirohodec.title: World Wanderer
map.advancement.mirohodec.description: What is this? It shouldn’t be here...
map.advancement.secret.title: Secret
map.advancement.secret.description: Well done! You found the secret! ☺
map.main_menu.subscribe: Join my Telegram channel and Discord server to be the first to know about the next chapter!
map.main_menu.hint: Use WASD to select, CTRL to go back, and Space to interact
map.credits.pressspace: Press Space to skip the credits
map.decor.youthought: Did you think there would be something here?
map.decor.board_line1:
1. Hot Coffee.
2. Mint Tea.
3. Carrot Cake.
4. Tomato Soup.
5. Cucumber Salad.
6. Cabbage Rolls.
map.decor.board_line2:
7. Carrot Juice.
8. Cabbage Salad.
NOT AVAILABLE ↓
9. Mashed po-
tatoes.
10. Beet sa-
lad.
map.achievement.roof_text: Wow, you actually took the time to climb up to the roof. Congratulations! You can click on this text to receive a secret achievement =-)
map.item_description.street_door_key.lin: §7I’m sure it wasn’t just lying in the storeroom
§7for no reason. Surely it’s meant to open something?
map.item_description.crowbar.line1: §7A random crowbar that I picked up in
map.item_description.crowbar.line2: §7the storeroom. It might come in handy.
map.interactable_description.street_door: A key along with a crowbar. No sign of the bartender... but maybe he's somewhere outside? I should take the key and see what it unlocks.
map.interactable_description.kitchen_doo: Key to the kitchen door. §8(Hint: to pick up the item, right-click the spot where you initially clicked)
